name: Universal FIPS provider module for streamlined certification

details.summary: FIPS module work (single file) - Simplifying the FIPS validation process through a single module provides the FIPS validated algorithms to the crypto libraries within the RHEL OS. This allows for a longer validation lifecycle and makes UBI and other faster-moving versions of RHEL benefit by having a valid FIPS certificate at all times.

The new ""soft reboot"" feature in systemd for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 10 enhances system management with minimal downtime. Unlike a traditional reboot that restarts both the kernel and userspace, a soft reboot targets only the userspace, shutting down and restarting all services and units without rebooting the kernel itself. This process begins by terminating running services and then re-executing the systemd service manager to bring the system back onlineâ€”all in a fraction of the time a full reboot requires. This feature is particularly valuable for enterprise environments where rapid updates or resets of userspace components, such as applications or libraries, are needed without disrupting kernel-level operations, making it ideal for scenarios like applying security patches, updating software stacks, or resetting system states in high-availability setups, all while maintaining continuous kernel uptime and reducing service interruptions.
